reviews.text: Bertie is more of a wizard than a travel agent. She is getting me where I am going for so much less cash without going all around the houses and stopping in every port. It seemed to be impossible but she sorted it in an hour. Kind and friendly and fun. Thank you, Bertie! Looking forward to my trip. Will definitely call you again.

The best travel agent I've ever worked with. Bertie is so professional and conscientious- always working hard to get the best deal for us. She is like a dog with a bone and will not give up.  Bertie can get deals and know the best solutions to all your travel needs. Would definitely recommend,

Bertie Travel go above and beyond to not only deliver the best possible travel itinerary but also to ensure that you get the lowest possible price... and all this accomplished with a wonderful human touch and considerate personalised care that the hordes of chat bots, algorithms and comparison sites can't come close to.  Thank you üôè

Bertie is the best of the best, if I could give 10 stars I would. She responds immediately, she is tireless and always joyful and goes above and beyond the stars and back to make things happen - professionally and perfectly. When I needed radical help with an urgent travel snafu, over a weekend, she got me out of a pretty pickle. And whats more - she's a gas.
